turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I order a few pizzas from Papa John's?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which Papa John's would you like to order from? Would you like me to look up the closest one to you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure, the closest one in Chicago, IL sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I will order from the Papa John's on Division St, which would be the closest to you. How many pizzas do you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order 3 large hand-tossed pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, got it. What kind of toppings do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want pepperoni and green pepper on all all 3 pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want any sides with that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I want a side of 8 hot wings.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, actually, can you add a small order of cheesy bread too?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. Anything else before I make the order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a 2 L bottle of coke too?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You got it. That'll be $45. Is this for pickup?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, for pickup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, your order of 3 large hand-tossed pizzas with pepperoni and green pepper on all 3 pizzas and an order of 8 hot wings, a small cheesy bread, and a 2 L bottle of coke from Papa John's on Division St. in Chicago, IL for $45 is confirmed.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great! Thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. Anything else I can help with tonight?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's all, thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, the details of this order are being sent to your mobile phone via text message. Your order will be ready for pickup in 25 minutes. Bye!
